title: Castlery's Black Friday Sale Has the Sectional That Makes My Space Feel Bigger
description: Get hundreds of dollars off! READ MORE...
author: Sarah M. Vazquez
text: DecoratingFurnitureShoppingWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Before the holidays arrive — and you start spending more time at home to avoid the cold weather — you should try to get your space as comfortable as possible. Is your old couch not quite cutting it anymore? Need a cozy rug to make your room feel warmer? Now is the time to make those upgrades, and not just because of how much of a homebody you’ll become during the winter. No, it’s because now is your chance to snag some new furniture and decor at Black Friday prices.Fortunately, many brands’ sales are already underway weeks in advance of the official day, including Castlery’s. The editor-favorite retailer is currently offering its lowest prices of the year until Dec. 1. You can score up to $600 off sitewide and up to 40% off sale picks, and everything from a small space-friendly sectional (which is AT-approved) to a beautiful bouclé armchair is discounted. Check out our best finds below!1 / 11Castlery$449.00was $599.00If you’re into design, you’ve likely seen chairs like the Paloma Boucle Armchair all over the place. Why? Well, it’s because of their versatility! These pieces can be used anywhere in the home, from your dining setup to your bedroom to your living room and more. So why not add this playful pick to your home this Black Friday?2 / 11Castlery$2249.00was $2499.00If a new sofa is on your radar this Black Friday, the Owen Chaise Sectional is a hard one to beat. This editor-favorite find has a lot of features to love about it: plush cushions with washable covers, a customizable chaise design, and over a dozen colors to choose from being only some of them. It also feels much bigger than it actually is, according to our reviewer, which makes it perfect for small spaces.3 / 11Castlery$119.00was $149.00A good rug is the perfect way to instantly cozy up a space. Case in point: the Nova Cotton area rug. Its neutral gray hue makes it easy to incorporate into any space. Meanwhile, its textured finish adds some dimension as well as warms up the space. And at this price point, how can you say no?4 / 11Castlery$379.00was $549.00It might be toward the tail end of outdoor entertaining season for most, but if you’re looking to save big on outdoor furniture for next year, right now is the perfect time to do so. We love these gorgeous (and stackable) outdoor chairs for their sleek look and touch and natural elements with its chic wicker detailing.5 / 11Castlery$239.00was $261.00While Castlery may be best known for its furniture, it’s also home to some stunning kitchen items. Take the Audrey dinnerware set, for example. Available in three earthy tones, this inviting set looks like it just came off the pottery wheel for the ultimate 20-piece set.6 / 11Castlery$1819.00was $1917.00The right bed can be the secret to finally getting the sleep you’ve always dreamed of. Our favorite pick from the brand? the Dalton bed. Described as “seriously gorgeous” and “the space-saving solution my small bedroom needed” in one contributor's review, this pick is every bit study and storage-conscious as it is stunning to look at. Best of all, it comes in a punch of options, including the aforementioned storage bed solution or as a set with gorgeous side tables!7 / 11Castlery$719.00was $799.00Castlery’s storage selection is one of the most underrated parts of its site, so if you’re looking to score a great dresser this Black Friday, check out the Joseph 3-Drawer dresser. Deep and roomy, we love its warm walnut tone and trendy look.8 / 11Castlery$479.00was $559.00Looking to save big on an outdoor dining set for next year’s entertaining season? Check out this chic set! Coming with a foldable table and two chic wicker dining chairs, it's perfect for compact spaces, adding a touch of elegance to even the tiniest outdoor areas.9 / 11Castlery$1199.00How stunning is the Harper TV stand? This mid-century console features an eye-catching design thanks to its oval silhouette and tamboured doors, making it the ultimate conversation piece. Best of all, this pick lies close to the ground, meaning it won’t lift your TV too far off the ground helping you avoid that dreaded neck pain. Who can say no to style and a smart design.10 / 11Castlery$749.00was $788.00It’s hard to fight the allure of a swivel chair, and when you see the Amber Boucle Swivel chair, you’re sure to be taken, too. Covered in the ever popular fabric, this chair also comes complete with a matching stool that one writer shared can even double as a chic side table! So if you’re looking to create the ultimate lounging experience, this is one find you won’t want to pass up.11 / 11Castlery$1359.00was $1426.00With the holidays quickly approaching, it’s important to make sure you have ample space to seat all of your loved ones. If a new dining setup is on your shopping list, you’re going to love the Seb set. This fun array features a rustic, homey feel thanks to sleek mid-century design, warm walnut hue, and cozy bench seating you and your guests will adore.
html:
• Decorating
  • Furniture
  • Shopping

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Before the holidays arrive — and you start spending more time at home to avoid the cold weather — you should try to get your space as comfortable as possible. Is your old couch not quite cutting it anymore? Need a cozy rug to make your room feel warmer? Now is the time to make those upgrades, and not just because of how much of a homebody you’ll become during the winter. No, it’s because now is your chance to snag some new furniture and decor at Black Friday prices.

Fortunately, many brands’ sales are already underway weeks in advance of the official day, including Castlery’s. The editor-favorite retailer is currently offering its lowest prices of the year until Dec. 1. You can score up to $600 off sitewide and up to 40% off sale picks, and everything from a small space-friendly sectional (which is AT-approved) to a beautiful bouclé armchair is discounted. Check out our best finds below!

1 / 11

Castlery

$449.00

was $599.00

If you’re into design, you’ve likely seen chairs like the Paloma Boucle Armchair all over the place. Why? Well, it’s because of their versatility! These pieces can be used anywhere in the home, from your dining setup to your bedroom to your living room and more. So why not add this playful pick to your home this Black Friday?

2 / 11

Castlery

$2249.00

was $2499.00

If a new sofa is on your radar this Black Friday, the Owen Chaise Sectional is a hard one to beat. This editor-favorite find has a lot of features to love about it: plush cushions with washable covers, a customizable chaise design, and over a dozen colors to choose from being only some of them. It also feels much bigger than it actually is, according to our reviewer, which makes it perfect for small spaces.

3 / 11

Castlery

$119.00

was $149.00

A good rug is the perfect way to instantly cozy up a space. Case in point: the Nova Cotton area rug. Its neutral gray hue makes it easy to incorporate into any space. Meanwhile, its textured finish adds some dimension as well as warms up the space. And at this price point, how can you say no?

4 / 11

Castlery

$379.00

was $549.00

It might be toward the tail end of outdoor entertaining season for most, but if you’re looking to save big on outdoor furniture for next year, right now is the perfect time to do so. We love these gorgeous (and stackable) outdoor chairs for their sleek look and touch and natural elements with its chic wicker detailing.

5 / 11

Castlery

$239.00

was $261.00

While Castlery may be best known for its furniture, it’s also home to some stunning kitchen items. Take the Audrey dinnerware set, for example. Available in three earthy tones, this inviting set looks like it just came off the pottery wheel for the ultimate 20-piece set.

6 / 11

Castlery

$1819.00

was $1917.00

The right bed can be the secret to finally getting the sleep you’ve always dreamed of. Our favorite pick from the brand? the Dalton bed. Described as “seriously gorgeous” and “the space-saving solution my small bedroom needed” in one contributor's review, this pick is every bit study and storage-conscious as it is stunning to look at. Best of all, it comes in a punch of options, including the aforementioned storage bed solution or as a set with gorgeous side tables!

7 / 11

Castlery

$719.00

was $799.00

Castlery’s storage selection is one of the most underrated parts of its site, so if you’re looking to score a great dresser this Black Friday, check out the Joseph 3-Drawer dresser. Deep and roomy, we love its warm walnut tone and trendy look.

8 / 11

Castlery

$479.00

was $559.00

Looking to save big on an outdoor dining set for next year’s entertaining season? Check out this chic set! Coming with a foldable table and two chic wicker dining chairs, it's perfect for compact spaces, adding a touch of elegance to even the tiniest outdoor areas.

9 / 11

Castlery

$1199.00

How stunning is the Harper TV stand? This mid-century console features an eye-catching design thanks to its oval silhouette and tamboured doors, making it the ultimate conversation piece. Best of all, this pick lies close to the ground, meaning it won’t lift your TV too far off the ground helping you avoid that dreaded neck pain. Who can say no to style and a smart design.

10 / 11

Castlery

$749.00

was $788.00

It’s hard to fight the allure of a swivel chair, and when you see the Amber Boucle Swivel chair, you’re sure to be taken, too. Covered in the ever popular fabric, this chair also comes complete with a matching stool that one writer shared can even double as a chic side table! So if you’re looking to create the ultimate lounging experience, this is one find you won’t want to pass up.

11 / 11

Castlery

$1359.00

was $1426.00

With the holidays quickly approaching, it’s important to make sure you have ample space to seat all of your loved ones. If a new dining setup is on your shopping list, you’re going to love the Seb set. This fun array features a rustic, homey feel thanks to sleek mid-century design, warm walnut hue, and cozy bench seating you and your guests will adore.
